articles.title: India bowling line-up for WTC Final still a mystery for Australia - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Australia are preparing to face star all-rounder Ravindra Jadeja in the ICC World Test Championship Final, but remain unsure whether veteran spinner Ravichandran Ashwin will join him in India's XI.

articles.author: Chris Lau
articles.title: Pterosaur bones found in Australia reveal world’s oldest flying reptile lived there 107 million years ago - CNN
articles.description: Pterosaurs, the world’s oldest flying reptiles, once flew in Australia’s skies as far back as 107 million years ago, according to a study published Wednesday.
articles.content:
Pterosaurs, the worlds oldest flying reptiles, once flew in Australias skies as far back as 107 million years ago, according to a study published Wednesday.
